document.full_text: a unit of bailed-out insurer american international group must pay $86.7 million to a u.s.-based unit of a belgian bank over a dispute involving an investor in life insurance policies, the wall street journal reported.
document.title: aig unit must pay $86.7 million in arbitration ruling: report
lines_and_colors: a unit of bailed-out insurer american international group must pay $86.7 million to a u.s.-based unit of a belgian bank over a dispute involving an investor in life insurance policies, the wall street journal reported.
